entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:32 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
